tamk.tiko.com.weatherapp

Class MainActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • tamk.tiko.com.weatherapp.MainActivity

  • public class MainActivity
extends java.lang.Object
    Main activity. Contains data of current weather of current location. Handles updating data from openweathermap.org.
    Since:
    1.7
